content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cos to the power of negative 1 end exponent x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. ​Which of the following is the graph of <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane?

choices.label:
​

All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (negative 1 comma negative pi).

The curve trends up steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma negative pi over 2), then increases gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma 0).

​

All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (negative 1 comma pi).

The curve trends down steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma pi over 2), then decreases gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma 0).

​

All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (negative 1 comma negative pi over 2).

The curve trends up steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma 0), then increases gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma pi over 2).

All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (negative 1 comma pi over 2).

The curve trends down steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma 0), then decreases gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma negative pi over 2).

content.answer:
​

All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (negative 1 comma pi).

The curve trends down steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma pi over 2), then decreases gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma 0).

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
